name: General Chemistry
description: This course introduces students to the principles of general chemistry. Students will learn about atomic structure, chemical bonding, stoichiometry, chemical reactions, and thermodynamics.

name: Organic Chemistry
description: This course introduces students to the principles of organic chemistry. Students will learn about the structure, properties, and reactions of organic compounds.

name: Physical Chemistry
description: This course introduces students to the principles of physical chemistry. Students will learn about thermodynamics, kinetics, quantum mechanics, and spectroscopy.

name: Analytical Chemistry
description: This course introduces students to the principles of analytical chemistry. Students will learn about quantitative analysis, including chemical equilibrium and electrochemistry, and qualitative analysis.

name: Medicinal Chemistry
description: This course introduces students to the principles of medicinal chemistry. Students will learn about drug design, synthesis, and evaluation, as well as pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics.
